properties.value: Retrospective verdict update received by Talos
properties.name: Sigthings_title

properties.description:
Tasks needed to build the workflow
[ ] Creates metadata for new incident - CTIA incident json
[ ] Creates Sighting for the given targets and observables
[ ] Creates relationship between new Sighting and incident
[ ] Creates CTIA bundle with new incident, Sightings and Relationships

actions.name: Condition Block
actions.title: Create Transient Id if not given

properties.display_name: Create Transient Id if not given

properties.script:
import time
import hashlib

def create_incident_xid():
    hash_strings = ["$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.input.variable_workflow_01KE0RO1VWZQI6kmlGtj58EkgsSbeYpo2TJ$" + str(time.time())]
    hash_input = "|".join(hash_strings)
    hash_value = hashlib.sha256(hash_input.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest()
    incident_xid = 'ao-' + hash_value
    return incident_xid

incidentXid = create_incident_xid()
incidentTransientId = 'transient:' + incidentXid

import hashlib
import json
import sys
from datetime import datetime, date, timedelta

def today():
    d = date.today()
    return d.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

def create_incident_object(xid):
    start_date = today()
    incident_obj_json = {}
    incident_obj_json["id"] = sys.argv[2]
    incident_obj_json["type"] = "incident"
    incident_obj_json["title"] = sys.argv[3]
    incident_obj_json["short_description"] = sys.argv[3]
    incident_obj_json["description"] = sys.argv[4]
    incident_obj_json["status"] = "New"
    incident_obj_json["confidence"] = "High"
    incident_obj_json["schema_version"] = "1.0.11"
    incident_obj_json["incident_time"] = {"discovered": "$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.output.start_time$", "opened": "$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.output.start_time$" }
    incident_obj_json["external_ids"] = [xid]
    incident_obj_json["source"] = "ao"
    incident_obj_json["external_references"] = [{"source_name":"ao", "url": "$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.local.variable_workflow_01KE0RO1VWJ7M17Qi92cCnHDkuL8MpvqqFv$$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.input.variable_workflow_01KE0RO1VWOK93suCfFCWpwR5WaixcmLCas$"}]
    incident_obj_json["tlp"] = "amber"
    incident_obj_json["discovery_method"] = "Monitoring Service"
    return json.dumps(incident_obj_json)

incident_obj = create_incident_object(sys.argv[1])

import hashlib
import json
import sys
from datetime import datetime, date, timedelta

def create_sighting_xid(sighting_title):
    d = datetime.now()
    current_time = d.strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S")
    hash_strings = [sighting_title, current_time]
    hash_input = "|".join(hash_strings)
    hash_value = hashlib.sha256(hash_input.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest()
    sighting_xid = "ao-" + hash_value
    return sighting_xid

def today():
    d = date.today()
    return d.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

def create_sighting_object(xid):
    start_date = today()
    sighting_obj_json = {}
    sighting_obj_json["confidence"] = "High"
    observables = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
    sighting_obj_json["observables"] = observables
    target_observable = json.loads(sys.argv[2])
    sighting_obj_json['targets'] = [{'type': 'endpoint', 'observables': target_observable, 'observed_time':{'start_time': start_date }}]
    sighting_obj_json["external_references"] = [{"source_name":"ao", "url": "$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.local.variable_workflow_01KE0RO1VWJ7M17Qi92cCnHDkuL8MpvqqFv$$workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.input.variable_workflow_01KE0RO1VWOK93suCfFCWpwR5WaixcmLCas$"}]
    sighting_obj_json["external_ids"] = [xid]
    sighting_obj_json["id"] ="transient:"+xid
    sighting_obj_json["description"] = "|Sighting Title| $workflow.definition_workflow_01KE0RO272GRY1cOhLs5S0qXEn6TUnmP2ZF.local.variable_workflow_01KFADR17FGO77kovtS3o717PhXnAyCN7VV$|\n|------------------|:----------------:|\n|Time|"+start_date+"|\n"
    sighting_obj_json["source"] = "ao"
    sighting_obj_json["type"] = "sighting"
    sighting_obj_json["observed_time"] = {"start_time": start_date }
    sighting_obj_json["tlp"] = "amber"
    return json.dumps(sighting_obj_json)

sighting_xid = create_sighting_xid("Malicious Artifacts found during workflow run" )
sighting_transient_id="transient:"+sighting_xid
sighting=create_sighting_object(sighting_xid)

import sys
import hashlib
import json

def create_relationship_object(source_xid, target_xid, relationship_xid, relationship_type):
    relationship_json = {}
    relationship_json["external_ids"] = [relationship_xid]
    relationship_json["source_ref"] = source_xid
    relationship_json["target_ref"] = target_xid
    relationship_json["source"] = "ao"
    relationship_json["relationship_type"] = relationship_type
    relationship_json["type"] = "relationship"
    return json.dumps(relationship_json)

def generate_relationship_xid(source_xid, target_xid):
    hash_value = hashlib.sha1((source_xid + target_xid).encode('utf-8'))
    hash_value = hash_value.hexdigest()
    relationship_xid = "relationship-" + hash_value
    return relationship_xid

relationship_xid=generate_relationship_xid(sys.argv[1],sys.argv[2])
relationship=create_relationship_object(sys.argv[1],sys.argv[2],relationship_xid,"member-of")
